channel.title: Looking for development team for a new Oldschool Runescape Server
channel.description:
[center]Current server development team; Me & my good friend Chachie. We are looking for someone who knows how to program PI, someone who knows how to program web-based stuff & someone who's good in clients.
(Please, before saying PI sucks, we have fixed the memleaks, dupes & have started rewriting the skills. Please don't hate before you see the progress me & chachie have done alone in only a few days using a blank PI server.) www.youtube.com/netherscape <- Watch
Also, I am not a professional coder, but I do have a few years of Delta experience and roughly a year of PI experience. I also have a lifetime VPS which everyone in the development team will get access to. [/center]
My msn: m.ikael@hotmail.com
